code: import React,{useState,useContext}from'react';import{Container,Row,Col,Card,Form,Button,Alert}from'react-bootstrap';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{AuthContext}from'../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({email:'',password:''});const[error,setError]=useState('');const[isLoading,setIsLoading]=useState(false);const{login}=useContext(AuthContext);const navigate=useNavigate();const{email,password}=formData;const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');setIsLoading(true);try{const userData=await login(email,password);console.log('Login successful, user data:',userData);console.log('User role:',userData.role);if(userData.role==='admin'){navigate('/admin');}else{navigate('/dashboard');}}catch(err){setError(err.message||'Login failed.
